sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT u.id AS value , u.label as text , u._order FROM licenseusage u, productpackage p WHERE 1 = 1 AND u.id = p.licenseusage AND p.product = #value# ORDER BY _order ASC
SELECT DISTINCT t.id AS value , t.label AS text FROM licenseterm t, productpackage p WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.id = p.licenseterm AND p.product = #value# ORDER BY t.id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT s.id AS value , s.label AS text FROM licensesize s, productpackage p WHERE 1 = 1 AND s.id = p.licensesize AND p.product = #value# ORDER BY s.id ASC
SELECT T.id AS value, T.label AS text FROM licenseterm T JOIN licensedependency D ON T.id = D.type WHERE 1 = 1 AND D.category = 'term' AND D.licensetype = #licensetype#
SELECT S.id AS value, S.label AS text FROM licensesize S JOIN licensedependency D ON S.id = D.type WHERE 1 = 1 AND D.category = 'size' AND D.licensetype = #licensetype#;
SELECT type , factor FROM licensepricefactor WHERE 1 = 1 AND type = #type# AND category = #category# ORDER BY type ASC
